title: Brussel Sprouts And Lemon Pasta
summary: Brussel Sprouts And Lemon Pasta might be just the Mediterranean recipe you are searching for. One portion of this dish contains approximately 11g of protein, 25g of fat, and a total of 453 calories. This recipe serves 2 and costs $1.01 per serving. It works well as a rather inexpensive side dish. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes around 15 minutes. 8 people have made this recipe and would make it again. It is a good option if you're following a dairy free diet. If you have pasta, garlic, lemon zest, and a few other ingredients on hand, you can make it. With a spoonacular score of 97%, this dish is excellent. Try Lemon Brussel Sprouts, Sweet Potato Pasta with Brussel Sprouts, and Pasta with Roasted Brussel Sprouts and Cauliflower – 6 Points for similar recipes.

winePairing.pairingText: Italian can be paired with Chianti, Trebbiano, and Verdicchio. Italians know food and they know wine. Trebbiano and Verdicchio are Italian white wines that pair well with fish and white meat, while Chianti is a great Italian red for heavier, bolder dishes. The Caposaldo Chianti with a 5 out of 5 star rating seems like a good match. It costs about 13 dollars per bottle.

productMatches.title: Caposaldo Chianti
productMatches.description: Ruby red with an aroma and flavor of red cherries, a smooth texture, excellent structure and a long, elegant finish. Best with pizza, pasta with tomato- or meat-based sauces, meaty mushrooms, roasted chicken or grilled meats.Blend: 75% Sangiovese, 10% Cabernet Sauvignon, 10% Merlot, 5% Malvasia
